lom:description.lom:string: The Mathematics Team at the Illinois Mathematics and Science Academy presents a wide variety of mathematics and computer science courses, extra-curricular activities, and teaching and educational resources. We are proud of the role we play in providing a solid mathematics background for our students and in furthering the general mission and goals of IMSA. The software provides dynamic and comprehensive curriculum informed by current thinking in the mathematical and educational communities, cognitive science, and internal experimentation, which includes a core base of knowledge in the mathematical and computer sciences. The software supports and promotes the development and dissemination of innovative pedagogy, curriculum, assessment and philosophy both internally and externally to the academy.

lom:title.lom:string: Mathematics: Illinois Mathematics and Science Academy
